app.shared.utils.bbox.Segment¶

class app.shared.utils.bbox.Segment(left: float | None, top: float | None = None, width: float | None = None, height: float | None = None, precision: int = 2)¶

A bounding box segment (x, y, w, h) in relative (0-1) format, Or None for full size
